After.Name: CompName
After.Value: SQL:SELECT DIST_NAME FROM MST_DIST WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SYNCOPERATION != 'D'

After.Name: UserName
After.Value: SQL:SELECT SLSMAN_NAME FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#'

After.Name: UserType
After.Value: SQL:SELECT SLSMAN_OPRTYPE FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#'

After.Name: VAN_CD
After.Value: SQL:SELECT ISNULL(VAN_CD,'') AS VAN_CD FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#'

After.Name: WHS_CD
After.Value: SQL:SELECT ISNULL(WHS_CD,'') AS WHS_CD FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#'

After.Name: GPS_IND
After.Value: SQL:SELECT ISNULL(GPS_IND,'0') AS GPS_IND FROM MST_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#'

After.Name: GEOTREE_CD
After.Value: SQL:SELECT ISNULL(TREE_ID,'') AS GEOTREE_CD FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#'

After.Name: COMPANY_FLAG
After.Value: SQL:SELECT ISNULL(COMPANY,'D') AS COMPANY_FLAG FROM MST_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#CompCD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#UserCD#'

After.Name: ExeSQL
After.Value: EXEC dbo.SCA_HHTPWD_RESET '#COMP_CD#','#SLSMAN_CD#'

After.Name: ExeSQL
After.Value: EXEC dbo.SCA_HHTPWD_UNLOCK '#COMP_CD#','#SLSMAN_CD#'

After.Value: SQL:select dbo.GetCountryDate()

After.Value: EXEC SCA_FCA_SLSMANPRDGRP '#COMP_CD#','#SLSMAN_CD#','#SLSMAN_OPRTYPE#','#UserTimeIn#'

After.Name: ExeSQL

Before.Name: ExeSQL
Before.Value: DELETE FROM TXN_RACTIVITY WHERE DIST_CD='#M_SETUP_SLSMAN.COMP_CD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#M_SETUP_SLSMAN.SLSMAN_CD#' AND RA_CD='#RA_CD#' AND CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),ACTIVITY_DT,23)=CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),#ACTIVITY_DT#,23) AND ACTIVITY_CD='#ACTIVITY_CD#' AND ACTIVITY_TYPE='#ACTIVITY_TYPE#' AND CUST_CD='#CUST_CD#' AND CUSTLOC_CD='#CUSTLOC_CD#' AND PRDCAT_CD='#CAT_CD#' AND VISIT_FREQUENCY='#VISIT_FREQUENCY#' AND WEEK_MONTH='#WEEK_MONTH#'

After.Name: ExeSQL

After.Name: MENU_3
After.Value: EXEC SCA_TXN_MERC_AGRTP_UPDATE '#TXN_KEY#'

After.Name: ExeSQL
After.Value: UPDATE TXN_MERC_AGREECOMPHDR SET REWARD_IND = '1' WHERE '#TXN_STATUS#' = 'O' AND TXN_KEY IN (SELECT AGREEMENT_KEY FROM TXN_MERC_REWARDDTL WHERE TXN_KEY = '#TXN_KEY#')

After.Name: MENU_5
After.Value: DELETE FROM MST_MERC_PLANOIMG_DELETED WHERE PLANO_CD='#PLANO_CD#'

After.Name: MENU_9
After.Value: SQL:SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM MST_ROUTEDELEGATION A INNER JOIN MST_SLSMAN B on B.SLSMAN_CD = A.SLSMAN_CD AND B.DIST_CD = A.DIST_CD AND B.HHT_FLAG=1 WHERE A.DIST_CD='#DIST_CD#' AND A.SLSMAN_CD='#SLSMAN_CD#' AND A.PARENT_CD='#PARENT_CD#' AND A.ASS_CD='#ASS_CD#' AND A.SYNCOPERATION != 'D' AND B.SYNCOPERATION != 'D'

After.Name: MENU_2
After.Value: EXEC SCA_TXN_ROUTEPLAN_UPDATE '#RS_IND#', '#SEQ_NO#','#M_SETUP_SLSMAN.COMP_CD#','#M_SETUP_SLSMAN.SLSMAN_CD#','#VISIT_DT#','#CUST_CD#','#CYCLE_CD#'

Before.Name: MENU_3
Before.Value: DELETE FROM MST_CUST_IMAGE WHERE CUST_CD='#CUST_CD#' AND IMAGES = '#PIC_NAME#'

After.Name: ExeSQL
After.Value: EXEC SCA_TXN_SLSMAN_DEVICE '#COMP_CD#','#SLSMAN_CD#','#s_DeviceID#'

After.Name: SLSMAN_NAME
After.Value: SQL:SELECT SLSMAN_NAME FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#COMP_CD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#SLSMAN_CD#'

After.Name: SLSMAN_OPRTYPE
After.Value: SQL:SELECT SLSMAN_OPRTYPE FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#COMP_CD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#SLSMAN_CD#'

After.Name: VAN_CD
After.Value: SQL:SELECT ISNULL(VAN_CD,'') AS VAN_CD FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#COMP_CD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#SLSMAN_CD#'

After.Name: WHS_CD
After.Value: SQL:SELECT ISNULL(WHS_CD,'') AS WHS_CD FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#COMP_CD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#SLSMAN_CD#'

After.Name: GEOTREE_CD
After.Value: SQL:SELECT ISNULL(TREE_ID,'') AS GEOTREE_CD FROM VCA_SLSMAN WHERE DIST_CD='#COMP_CD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#SLSMAN_CD#'

After.Name: CurrentSystemDate
After.Value: SQL:select CONVERT(VARCHAR(12),dbo.GetCountryDate(),23)

After.Name: UserTimeIn
After.Value: SQL:select dbo.GetCountryDate()

After.Name: ExeSQL
After.Value: UPDATE NP_FCA_SLSMAN_SYNC_TIMER set TIME_END='#UserTimeIn#' WHERE DIST_CD='#COMP_CD#' AND SLSMAN_CD='#SLSMAN_CD#'
